name: Banananaguy
description:
:

Bananaguy wakes up and sees his banana is missing! Make your way through a colorful world filled with hard but fun challenges. Unlock new power ups to make Bananaguys moveset grow! Retrieve your lost banana and consume it in the comfort of your home :D

Content:

  • More than 50+ screens of hard challenges
  • An overworld filled with secrets to explore
  • 3 different power ups, easy to learn but with much depth for mastery of the controls
  • A secret extra hard level for the bravest ;)

Controls:

  • Move - arrows, WASD, left stick, d-pad
  • Jump - Z, space, Xbox A and B
  • Crouch - down arrow, S, left stick down, Xbox X, Y, R, L

Developer Notes:

I hope you enjoy the game! :D If you liked it consider checking out the Discord or the Speedruns of the game!
